original_text: A man must know how to take care of his own family. If he cannot do that, he will not be able to take care of God's people in the church.
korean_text: (사람이 자기 집을 다스릴 줄 알지 못하면 어찌 하나님의 교회를 돌보리요)

sentences.original_text: how to take care of his own family

sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그가 그것을 할 수 없다면

sentences.original_text: he will not be able to take care
of God's people in the church
